title: Suicide rate rises as refugees lose hope of U.S. life
text:
Suicide rate rises as refugees lose hope of U.S. life 4:07pm BST - 01:55 
In a Kenyan refugee camp, the hope of new life in the US fades and the suicide rate is rising. Knives. Wire. Battery acid. Rat poison. Rope. All are items which aid workers say they have confiscated from refugees in the Kakuma camp in northern Kenya in the last few months because of fears they might use them to kill themselves. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
